snippet: The head of Saudi Arabia's morals police criticized one of his officers this week for getting into a public confrontation with a young woman over her nail polish at a mall in Riyadh.
abstract: The head of Saudi Arabia's morals police criticized one of his officers this week for getting into a public confrontation with a young woman over her nail polish at a mall in Riyadh.

byline.original: By ROBERT MACKEY and J. DAVID GOODMAN

headline.main: A Rebuke for Saudi Morals Officer Who Chastised Woman Wearing Nail Polish
